attributes.action: re-examxne the wide ranging  cuts and so called rationalization in the justice department
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there is currently in place a plan to reduce the cost of running HMCS by  rationalizing the customer facing areas  of business and effectively reduce the number of staff at ground floor levels ,but, it  seems to have no effect on the upper level and/or managers, surely rationalization should start at the top, thereby reducing the budget spend by higher percentages in the long term by  greater amounts.
